title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Support to Agricultural Production and Marketing Project-Western Expansion

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to contribute to reducing rural poverty and stimulating economic growth in the regions of Tonpki, Kabadougou, Folon, Bafing, Worodougou and Béré. The development objective is to sustainably improve food security by increasing smallholder access to effective services, appropriate technology and markets while increasing the resilience of production systems to climate change.

name.narrative: Agricultural Development: Support to Agricultural Production and Marketing Project-Western Expansion

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
